changelog:
**Added:**
- Local play effects (3-key combo: local play + effect + slot)
- Console "Save to File" and "Copy to Clipboard" buttons
- "Save All" favourites button
- Capture own audio
- Capture notification sound
- Auto-trim (Preferences â†’ Auto-Trim Settings)

**Improved:**
- Hotkey stability with auto-monitoring and recovery
- 95% less disk I/O, 80% faster buttons
- Background audio threading, auto-restart after resets

**Fixed:**
- Audio playback length mismatch
- Crash when rapidly playing/stopping clips
